$comment: JSON Schema for the 'runShell' intent manifest (Version 1).
title: Run Shell Intent Manifest
description: Defines the data structure for a payload intended to execute a shell command within an isolated environment.

version.description: The manifest version. Locked to 'v1' to ensure compatibility.

command.description: The shell command to be executed. Must be a single command without arguments.

arguments.description: An array of arguments to be passed to the command.

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time in seconds to allow for execution before a timeout error.

environment.description: A dictionary of environment variables to be set for the execution.

stream_logs.description: If true, logs will be streamed in real-time. If false, logs will be returned in a single response.
